Effect.en: You can target 1 of your banished monsters, except "Nemesis Umbrella"; Special Summon this card from your hand, and if you do, shuffle that target into the Deck. You can target 1 "Nemesis" monster in your GY, except "Nemesis Umbrella"; add it to your hand. You can only use each effect of "Nemesis Umbrella" once per turn.
